Reviews.Title: Wire gauge are WAY too small and weak
Reviews.Author: Bruce L. Newland
Reviews.Content: The price may force you to use these, but if it is not the only factor you pay attention to, you may want to look at a better solution.The first wire I tried to pull through a wall using a fiber-fish rod ripped the wire just past the BNC and power terminals about 2.5"Even if it didn't rip, you get what you pay for. The company and their shipping time was great, but the product is inferior.I ended up breaking out my wallet and threw down $180.00 for the following:500' roll of Honeywell 20/1 RG6-18/2 siamese cable[...]25 pc. BNC compression terminals[...]I haven't bought the power terminals yet, but this new setup is a huge improvement. YMMV.

ProductInfo.Features:
60 feet video/power cables in white
Ready Plug and Play
ProductInfo.Name: 4 Pack of 60 Feet Pre-made All-in-One BNC Video and Power Cable for Security Cameras
